title: Fix callback test implementation for reliable async response handling
description: Implement robust callback test functionality that properly handles asynchronous Kiro CLI responses with timeout protection and cleanup mechanisms to ensure system reliability during automated code generation workflows
iWant: to fix the callback test implementation so it properly waits for and handles Kiro CLI responses
soThat: the automated testing system can reliably validate callback-driven workflows without hanging or producing false results
acceptanceCriteria: Callback registration stores pending requests with unique identifiers
System waits for actual Kiro CLI response before marking test complete
Timeout mechanism prevents indefinite waiting (max 30 seconds)
Proper cleanup removes completed or expired callbacks from memory
